en.pleaseSignInToVote: Welcome! Please sign in to participate in the elections.
en.demoModeDescription: This is a demonstration environment for testing purposes only.
en.demoModeWarning: Votes cast here will NOT be counted.
en.select15Council: Select Council Members by clicking on their card.
en.designate7Executive: Select 7 Executive Officers by clicking twice.
en.voteSubmittedMessage: Your vote has been successfully recorded.
en.electionClosedViewResults: Voting in this election is currently closed
en.notRegisteredContactAdmin: Your account is not registered to vote in this election.
en.adminPanelDescription: Manage candidates, schedule elections, and export data.

en.instructionsPopupNote: These instructions will only be shown once per session.
en.voting.maxCouncilReached: You can only select 15 council members
en.voting.submitError: An error occurred while submitting your vote. Please try again.
en.electionResultsPending: Voting is in progress. Partial results will be available after the election closes.
en.results.load.error: Error loading results. Please try again later.
en.core.electionStatusError: Unable to verify election status. Please refresh the page or try again later.
en.core.scheduleError: Please set both start and end times.
en.core.scheduleGeneralError: An error occurred while setting the schedule.
en.utils.candidatesNotLoaded: Candidate data is not loaded correctly.
en.utils.maxCouncilReached: You can only select 15 council members
en.utils.authenticationRequired: You must be authenticated before submitting.
en.utils.submitError: An error occurred while submitting your vote. Please try again.
en.utils.resultsLoadError: Error loading results. Please try again later.
en.utils.electionResultsPending: Voting is in progress. Partial results will be available after the election closes.
en.auth.demoSuccess: Demo mode: Authentication successful. You may now vote.
en.auth.googleError: An error occurred while redirecting to Google. Please try again or use Demo Mode.
en.auth.logoutError: Error occurred during logout. Please close and reopen the browser.
en.admin.requiredFields: Please fill in the required fields: Name and Brief Biography.
en.admin.confirmAddCandidate: Are you sure you want to add the candidate "{name}"? Please verify the details before proceeding.
en.admin.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
en.admin.addCandidateFailed: Failed to add candidate: Unknown error
en.admin.uiErrorToggleNotFound: UI Error: Toggle button not found.
en.admin.exportVotesCSVFailed: Failed to export votes to CSV
en.admin.dataBackedUp: Data backed up to cloud successfully
